alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 9:20AM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Ashley and Union Counties. For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 68.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to 72.5 feet Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 70.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 930 AM CST.
